text: Sutrieu is a former commune. It is found in the region Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes in the Ain department in the east of France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Valromey-sur-Séran.Arrêté préfectoral , 17 December 2018 == References == Category:Former communes in Ain
title: Sutrieu
